area.name: Area Card
area.description: Custom area card. Displays supported entities.

name.label: Card or area name
name.helper: Name of the card or the area

area.label: Area
area.helper: Select the zone to be displayed

mariadb.name: MariaDB Card
mariadb.description: Shows the status of the database. It also allows you to stop/start, restart and start cleaning.

purge.dialog: The database cleanup process will be started.

reload.dialog: The database server will be restarted.

stop.dialog: The database server will be stopped.

start.dialog: The database server will be started.

mariadb.error_db_stopped: The database server now is stopped.
